      • settleWin

        @Async
private double settleWin(Bet bet,
                                 Horse winner)
        Settles 'win only' bets. Formula used to calculate applies business logic of 'basic factors'
        Parameters:
        bet - The bet on which to calculate winnings if appropriate and set status
        winner - winning horse in race to which bet applies

      • settleEachWay

        @Async
private void settleEachWay(Bet bet,
                                   Race race)
        Settle each way bets. An each way bet consists of two individual bets - a win bet and a place bet, with half the stake being applied to each. Checks if the win part has of the bet has been successfully and settles that portion of the bet using win logic. The each way part is calculated using different business logic.
        Parameters:
        bet - The bet on which to calculate winnings if appropriate and set status
        winner - The bet on which to calculate win part of each way bet
        placedHorses - Horses that placed in the race, used to settle place part of each way bet
